translations: v.被伤害；被殴打（maul 的过去式形式）

sentences.sentence: He had been mauled by a bear.
They mauled and bit through all that day.
sentences.translation: 他们又捶又咬过了那一整日。

sentences.sentence: Then two bears came out of the woods and mauled forty-two of the youths.
sentences.translation: 于是有两个母熊从林中出来，撕裂他们中间四十二个童子。
